sentences.en: Air tightness test for auxiliary boiler ( economize boiler ) on board.
sentences.cn: 辅锅炉 ( 废气锅炉 ) 装船后气密试验.

sentences.en: Do we economize on lights, telephons, computers, air - conditioners and copy papers succesfully?
sentences.cn: 在你我使用电灯 、 电话 、 电脑 、 空调 、复印纸的时候,我们做到节约了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Economize in order to make one's money spin out until next payday.
sentences.cn: 节省花钱以维持到下一次发薪.

sentences.en: Economize on energy and resources to develop a cyclic economy.
sentences.cn: 节约各类能源和资源,努力发展循环经济.

sentences.en: He'd rather economize on clothes and food than travel.
sentences.cn: 他宁愿俭衣节食,而不愿节省旅游开销.

sentences.en: I'd rather economize on clothes than food.
Old people often try to economize on heating, thus endangering their health.
sentences.cn: 老年人常常想方设法节约用暖气，结果损害了他们的健康。

sentences.en: Our electricity bills are higher than we can afford we must start to economize.
sentences.cn: 我们的电费已经高得付不起了--得节省些了.

sentences.en: Pollution - free , economize and energy - saving, make it has green environmental - protective quality.
sentences.cn: 无污染 、 节电节能更具绿色环保品质.

sentences.en: Though water is a renewable resource, we should still economize.
sentences.cn: 水虽然是可再生资源, 但我们仍然需要节约使用.

sentences.en: We have to economize on water during the dry season.
sentences.cn: 我们在旱季不得不节约用水.

sentences.en: We should effectively protect, rationally exploit and economize on natural resources.
sentences.cn: 切实保护 、 合理开发和节约使用各种自然资源.

sentences.en: We should increase production and economize as much as possible.
sentences.cn: 文章要经常做在这上面.

sentences.en: We're going to have to economize from now on.
sentences.cn: 从现在开始，我们不得不节约开支。

words.tran_cn: 节约装置；节约者；经济家

trans.tran_en: to reduce the amount of money, time, goods etc that you use
